interfaces

Interface IntersectionInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Intersection

    public interface IntersectionInterface
    Public Interface for Intersection objects.
    Author:
    Borja Zarco, Anita

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRoad(Road road)
      Add a connecting road to the intersection.
      int canEnter(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting, Road roadEntering)
      Checks if there is room in the intersection and road to be entered (roadEntering) If yes, returns the index of the lane that the vehicle will enter in roadEntering If no room is available, return -1.
      double changeMode()
      Changes the mode of the intersection.
      int getDestinationID()
      Get Destination ID if Intersection is a Destination.
      java.lang.String getDestinationName()
      Get Destination name if Intersection is a Destination.
      int getID()
      Get Intersection ID.
      double getLatitude()
      Get Latitude coordinates (in degrees) of Intersection.
      double getLongitude()
      Get Longitude coordinates (in degrees) of Intersection.
      Parking getParking()
      Get Parking of Intersection (only if Intersection has a Parking)
      double[] getPosition(int width, int height, double minLat, double maxLat, double minLon, double maxLon)
      Get position of Intersection in X and Y coordinates scaled to the full system dimensions.
      int getVehicleCount()
      Get number of Vehicles arrived (only if Intersection is a Destination)
      boolean isDestination()
      Check if Intersection is a Destination.
      boolean isIdle()
      Returns whether the intersection is idle.
      boolean isIdle(double time)
      Checks whether the intersection is idle.
      boolean modeMatches(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting, Road roadEntering)
      Checks whether the Vehicle object car will be able to move from roadExiting to roadEntering through the intersection with the current mode of the intersection
      boolean modeMatches(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting, Road roadEntering, double time)
      Checks whether the Vehicle object car will be able to move from roadExiting to roadEntering through the intersection at the specified time
      void notIdle(double time)
      Sets the last active time (lastActive) of the intersection to be time and makes the intersection not idle.
      void notifyAll(double time)
      Notifies all connecting roads that the mode of the intersection has been changed at the time specified.
      void removeVehicle(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting)
      Removes the Vehicle car from the intersection.
      void render(int w, int h, double minLat, double maxLat, double minLon, double maxLon, double zoom, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      Render Destination in graphical representation.
      Road[] roadsAllowed()
      Returns an array of the roads that can be entered and exited in the current mode.
      Road[] roadsAllowed(double time)
      Returns a array of the roads that will be available to enter or exit at time time
      void setAsDestination(int ID, java.lang.String name)
      Set Intersection as a Destination.
      void setAsParking(int ID)
      Set Intersection as a Parking Intersection.
      void setInitialMode()
      If the intersection has a parking lot, calls notifyParking() to start emptying the parking.
      void setModes()
      Creates all the possible modes of the intersection, which will be cycled through whenever changeMode().
      void setParkingEmpty()
      Notify that Parking in Intersection is empty (only if Intersection has a Parking).
      void vehicleArrived()
      Increase count of Vehicles arrived (only if Intersection is a Destination)

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        int getID()
        Get Intersection ID.
        Returns:
        ID of Intersection

      • addRoad

        void addRoad(Road road)
        Add a connecting road to the intersection.
        Parameters:
        road -

      • canEnter

        int canEnter(Vehicle car,
           Road roadExiting,
           Road roadEntering)
        Checks if there is room in the intersection and road to be entered (roadEntering) If yes, returns the index of the lane that the vehicle will enter in roadEntering If no room is available, return -1. If the intersection is terminal, returns the static variable OneRoadIntersection of the class Event.
        Parameters:
        car -
        roadExiting -
        roadEntering -
        Returns:

      • getParking

        Parking getParking()
        Get Parking of Intersection (only if Intersection has a Parking)
        Returns:
        parking or null if it does not have a Parking

      • roadsAllowed

        Road[] roadsAllowed()
        Returns an array of the roads that can be entered and exited in the current mode.
        Returns:

      • roadsAllowed

        Road[] roadsAllowed(double time)
        Returns a array of the roads that will be available to enter or exit at time time
        Parameters:
        time -
        Returns:

      • removeVehicle

        void removeVehicle(Vehicle car,
                 Road roadExiting)
        Removes the Vehicle car from the intersection. The parameter roadExiting is the road from which the vehicle entered the intersection.
        Parameters:
        car -
        roadExiting -

      • modeMatches

        boolean modeMatches(Vehicle car,
                  Road roadExiting,
                  Road roadEntering,
                  double time)
        Checks whether the Vehicle object car will be able to move from roadExiting to roadEntering through the intersection at the specified time
        Parameters:
        car -
        roadExiting -
        time -
        Returns:

      • modeMatches

        boolean modeMatches(Vehicle car,
                  Road roadExiting,
                  Road roadEntering)
        Checks whether the Vehicle object car will be able to move from roadExiting to roadEntering through the intersection with the current mode of the intersection
        Parameters:
        car -
        roadExiting -
        Returns:

      • notifyAll

        void notifyAll(double time)
        Notifies all connecting roads that the mode of the intersection has been changed at the time specified.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • setAsDestination

        void setAsDestination(int ID,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Set Intersection as a Destination.
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of destination
        name - name of destination

      • getLatitude

        double getLatitude()
        Get Latitude coordinates (in degrees) of Intersection.
        Returns:
        latitude coordinates in degrees

      • getLongitude

        double getLongitude()
        Get Longitude coordinates (in degrees) of Intersection.
        Returns:
        longitude coordinates in degrees

      • changeMode

        double changeMode()
        Changes the mode of the intersection. The mode of the intersection specifies which connecting roads can be entered or exited using the intersection.
        Returns:

      • getDestinationName

        java.lang.String getDestinationName()
        Get Destination name if Intersection is a Destination.
        Returns:
        destination name (if any)

      • getDestinationID

        int getDestinationID()
        Get Destination ID if Intersection is a Destination.
        Returns:
        destination ID (if any)

      • vehicleArrived

        void vehicleArrived()
        Increase count of Vehicles arrived (only if Intersection is a Destination)

      • getVehicleCount

        int getVehicleCount()
        Get number of Vehicles arrived (only if Intersection is a Destination)
        Returns:

      • render

        void render(int w,
          int h,
          double minLat,
          double maxLat,
          double minLon,
          double maxLon,
          double zoom,
          java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Render Destination in graphical representation.
        Parameters:
        w - width of Canvas
        h - height of Canvas
        minLat - minimum Latitude coordinates of full system
        maxLat - maximum Latitude coordinates of full system
        minLon - minimum Longitude coordinates of full system
        maxLon - maximum Longitude coordinates of full system
        zoom - scale factor (modified when user zooms in/out)
        g2d - Graphics2D instance of Canvas

      • setAsParking

        void setAsParking(int ID)
        Set Intersection as a Parking Intersection.
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of the Parking the intersection holds

      • setModes

        void setModes()
        Creates all the possible modes of the intersection, which will be cycled through whenever changeMode().

      • setInitialMode

        void setInitialMode()
        If the intersection has a parking lot, calls notifyParking() to start emptying the parking. If it does not, sets the intersection as idle.

      • isDestination

        boolean isDestination()
        Check if Intersection is a Destination.
        Returns:
        true if Intersection is a Destination

      • notIdle

        void notIdle(double time)
        Sets the last active time (lastActive) of the intersection to be time and makes the intersection not idle.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • isIdle

        boolean isIdle(double time)
        Checks whether the intersection is idle. The passed parameter time is used to see how long it has been since the intersection was last active.
        Parameters:
        time -
        Returns:

      • isIdle

        boolean isIdle()
        Returns whether the intersection is idle.
        Returns:

      • getPosition

        double[] getPosition(int width,
                   int height,
                   double minLat,
                   double maxLat,
                   double minLon,
                   double maxLon)
        Get position of Intersection in X and Y coordinates scaled to the full system dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - width of Canvas
        height - height of Canvas
        minLat - minimum Latitude coordinates of full system
        maxLat - maximum Latitude coordinates of full system
        minLon - minimum Longitude coordinates of full system
        maxLon - maximum Longitude coordinates of full system
        Returns:
        position array (x and y)

      • setParkingEmpty

        void setParkingEmpty()
        Notify that Parking in Intersection is empty (only if Intersection has a Parking).
